shortDescription: Multiple reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the ErroreNonGestito.aspx component of GruppoSCAI RealGimm 1.1.37p38 allow attackers to execute arbitrary Javascript in the context of a victim user's browser via a crafted payload injected into the VIEWSTATE parameter.
vulnerabilityName: grupposcai realgimm Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
